verbose_text: While this mutation was originally proposed to explain the reduced ability of TCRV NP, in comparison to other arenavirus NPs, to inhibit type I interferon (IFN) production during infection [XREF_BIBR], the presence of a GPPT-to-DLQL mutation could not be confirmed by more-recent sequences derived from the TRVL-11573 isolate [XREF_BIBR], nor was it found in the 2012 Florida isolate [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: NPs, to inhibit type I interferon
